If notability cannot be shown, the article is likely to be merged, redirected, or deleted. *Find sources:* "Esco" Singaporean company – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2018)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Esco** is a Singaporean brand that develops, manufactures, and sells products and services for laboratories. Esco's products are used in academic, medical and industrial research laboratories in the [pharmaceutical](/wiki/Pharmaceutical_industry), [biotech](/wiki/Biotechnology), chemical and food industries. They are also used in industrial laboratories where industry, analysis, production and quality assurance are performed.[*citation needed*] ## History Esco started in 1978. Esco has won [Singapore Prestige Brand Awards](/wiki/Singapore_Prestige_Brand_Award)'s Regional Brand in 2014, 2015, and 2016. - Official website
title: Esco (Singaporean company)
